name: It's Rewind Time!
description:
yaaaah! It's rewind time!

  In this game you play as Will Smith and your objective is to make the cast of the infamous video, youtube rewind 2018 pay for the what they've done.

Might not work on mac and/or linux. I couldn't test it.

For the best experiene, play on a monitor with a resolution of 1920 x 1080 or higher. UI bugs might appear otherwise.
